docs.text:
Welcome to Grovelab


DevOps and Linux SysAdmin Wiki


Commands




mkdocs new [dir-name]
 - Create a new project.


mkdocs serve
 - Start the live-reloading docs server.


mkdocs build
 - Build the documentation site.


mkdocs help
 - Print this help message.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name]  - Create a new project.  mkdocs serve  - Start the live-reloading docs server.  mkdocs build  - Build the documentation site.  mkdocs help  - Print this help message.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text:
Find


find ~/ -type f -iname "gameme.smx" | while read line
do
  cp -v gameme.smx $line
done




Find and remove permissions


find . -type f -iname "*.ini" -exec chmod -x {} \;




Find port of runnin application


netstat -lnp | grep ts3
netstat -l -a -p -n  




Find appliction listening on a port


sudo lsof -i :80
docs.title: Linux Commands

docs.text:
find ~/ -type f -iname "gameme.smx" | while read line
do
  cp -v gameme.smx $line
done  Find and remove permissions  find . -type f -iname "*.ini" -exec chmod -x {} \;  Find port of runnin application  netstat -lnp | grep ts3
netstat -l -a -p -n    Find appliction listening on a port  sudo lsof -i :80
docs.title: Find

docs.text:
Checking logs, IpTables, Apache, Wordpress logins


Look at top IP addresses in your access log use:


tail -n 10000 access.log|cut -f 1 -d ' '|sort|uniq -c|sort -nr|more 




If nothing looks suspicious in IP list, use this query to check top hit URLs on your box:


cut -f 2 -d '"' access.log|cut -f 2 -d ' '|sort|uniq -c|sort -nr|more 




Check for common user agents :
 


cut -f 4 -d '"' access.log|sort|uniq -c|sort -nr|more 




Backup all changed config files


debsums -ce | tar --files-from=- -cf configs.tar
docs.title: Linux
